title: VHDL cheatsheet
description: This is a small vhdl cheatsheet made for the DSD course in first year at EPFL

title: Rogue-like game
description: RoguEPFL is a video game made as a first semester student project. It is a small game with intent to play a randomly generated map.

title: PixelPerfect QOI
description: Pixel perfect is a tool to convert png to QOI image file format (more efficient) back and forth.

title: Logisim lab session (logic counter)
description: This is my tp3/4 from the DSD course as a first year EPFL cs student. It is a logic counter made in Logisim-Evolution.
